## removeNodeBefore variable

Returns a new transaction that deletes previous node.

```ts
dispatch(
   removeNodeBefore(state.tr)
);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeNodeBefore: (tr: Transaction<any>) => Transaction<any>
```
